import React from 'react' import { Card, CardContent, Grid, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import cx from 'classnames'; const Cards = ({ data }) => { return ( data ?
Total Cases in India {new Date().toDateString()} Total COVID19 Confirmed Cases Recovered in India {new Date().toDateString()} Recovered COVID19 cases Death Toll in India {new Date().toDateString()} Total COVID19 Deaths
: null) } export default Cards;
